'''SchilliX''' is a [[LiveCD]] [[operating system]] [[Software distribution|distribution]] based on [[OpenSolaris]]. It was released on [[17 June]] [[2005]], three days after the first release of OpenSolaris. Its developers claim that it is the first OpenSolaris distribution. The initial developers were [[JÃ¶rg Schilling]], Fabian Otto, Thomas Blaesing, and Tobias Kirschstein.

'''SchilliX''' is a [[Live CD]] [[operating system]] [[Software distribution|distribution]] based on [[OpenSolaris]]. It was released on [[17 June]] [[2005]], three days after the first release of OpenSolaris. Its developers claim that it is the first OpenSolaris distribution. The initial developers were [[JÃ¶rg Schilling]], Fabian Otto, Thomas Blaesing, and Tobias Kirschstein.
The current release version is 0.6.2 <small>([[February 11]], [[2008]])</small>, which uses Solaris Nevada build 82.
